topic.title: Errors when I load a site offline
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.2
  * Operating system: Microsoft Windows 7
  * Web browser: Google CHrome
  * Tor status: available
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: None

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

When I try to load a site while i'm offline, all I get is errors.

#### Expected Results:

I expected it to load any way as it is peer-to-peer.
